techmeme.title: Sources: Indian rapid grocery delivery startup Zepto plans to raise ~$650M co-led by Nexus and StepStone at a valuation of $3.5B, up from $1.4B in August 2023 (Moneycontrol)
Databricks tells investors its annualized revenue is expected to reach $2.4B through July 2024, or the first half of its FY 2025, up 60% from a year earlier (Jordan Novet/CNBC)
A look at Satya Nadella's AI efforts; source: some future Microsoft AI products may be switched from OpenAI tech to the model being developed by Suleyman's team (Wall Street Journal)
Sources: Apple isn't paying OpenAI as part of their partnership and aims to eventually make money from AI by striking revenue-sharing deals with chatbot owners (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Japan passes a law that prohibits Apple and Google from limiting the sale of third-party apps and services that compete with native iOS and Android offerings (Kyodo News)
